subject: Mike's Micro Box now has Ion Detection too!
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Even though I have still not found the right size radio circuit board 
for a sweeping raw audio source, I have added a few more items to my 
Micro Box.  Today I designed and added an Ion Detector.  If you'd like 
to see how "busy" it now is, via my detailed breakout, go here: 
http://www.ufogeek.com/?p=169
My next addition has got to be raw audio generation.  I will not rest 
until I have this component!!!  The white noise is lonely for some raw 
audio...

All... have a safe and Happy Holiday!!!
- Mike
